page.title: 15HOUSING IN ROSSINGTON
page.content: There are different types of housing in and around Rossington. There are houses built originally for mine workers, council houses and private housing. The main London to Scotland railway line divides Old Rossington and New Rossington. In Old Rossington the houses are all private homes, but in New Rossington there are few private homes. There are terraces or semi_detached and detached types. My house is one of the houses on Greenlands Avenue, a private estate in Old Rossington. It is a bungalow built in 1970, on my road there are both bungalows and houses. They are mostly three bedroomed but mine has only two. We have lived in it for ten years. My house has two gardens.
